Articles.Content:
"The plane is veering slightly to the right of the runway......oh god....OH GOD! ccrrrkkkkkkshhhhhhhhhhh"

"Spaceplane 1, come in spaceplane 1, do you read me? over.........okay looks like he's dead. Alright, build another one, but this time angle the wheels 5 degrees more to the left, I'm certain it'll work this time."

"Why is the middle tank spending fuel faster than the external boosters?"

SAME MISSION: "Did both of those decouplers fire?"

This is just not my day...

Edited December 30, 2013 by The Jedi Master
"There's no way I'll burn through all this fuel," shortly before getting out to push.

''Oh, sausage...'' as my lander splats into the surface of Minmus.

''Oh, sausages!'' as my parachute opens while still in atmosphere.

My first Mun landing, back in 13.3

Oh my god, I'm just 70 kilometers above the Muns surface! there is now way I can screw this up!

then I notice that after I deorbited my fuel dropped to like 20%, and having no previous experience with mun landings I concluded that that was okay and continued falling.

And no, it wasn't the running out of fuel bit that killed me, it was the crashing into the grown at 200m's because I trusted the ASL altimeter, Last words were "Huh, the ground looks closer than it should be."

"I think this should work..."

"Huh."

First one is usually before a launch, second is usually after something goes wrong.
"Hmm... that doesn't seem righ-"

"It's been a pleasure serving, Kitty."

Jeb's last words, Eve

Oh, hi son. how was school?

Oh noooooo! missed the stage.... I am not gonna make it! ah well (F9...). So how was your day, son?

Happens to me at least a couple of times a week : )
Ah, just another milk run to the Mun and back. What could go wrong?
"*****" I say as i realize i forgot the fuel lines
Heard from my son, across the room playing 0.22 Ã¢â‚¬Â¦ "Well, that can't be goodÃ¢â‚¬Â¦"

"I should probably add struts next time" my Laythe station as it's right before aerobraking at jool, the docking ports got ripped apart the station and the solar panels got hit by ripped off pieces of the station.

"Hmm time warping may make the landing a little faster" as i was about to land at Eve, but ended up getting trowed at 136x light speed into interstellar space.
'At least I set up an abort system' - shortly before the abort system malfunctions and fires the command pod back through the rest of the ship, ripping off the parachutes.
*Click* Huh strange where is the 15 Gs from the parachute? *CSSSHHHHHHHHH!!!!!*
"Hold on, the reentry vehicle only has 3 seats for the 4 of us..." - Unfortunate member of a minmus science expedition

"I think that I'll be fine with all the wobbling"

"It won't stop wobbling. I'm going to turn on MechJeb and RCS and let it settle down"

Once in orbit...

"Ok, time to lay over and fire prograde. MechJeb, point me in the right direction"

(Regarding Mun landing of an unmanned lander) "Hmm. I'm sure this nuke will kill 100m/s in 1km"

"Ok, fire +Rad and... where did that hill come from?" (seems I forgot to kill horizontal speed correctly)
"Not... Enough... Boosters"

When I was showing my brother an SSTO attempt.

"Don't worry it'll take off when it gets to 80m/s ... any second now ... um ... up? (with hand gesture) ... up ... UP!" Crashed off the end of the runway

"I think this might just land...." Crashes horribly into planet/moon.

"T minus 10 seconds to liftoff, 10, 9, 8, 7, 6...." Whole ship explodes.... "When did I add that feature?"
Plane loses critical parts due to randomness, "jump kerbal, save yourself!" Kerbal crashes into terain, pod survives...
Everythings nominal....

Bob hurdling at the surface of the moon at 500m/s after being flung off the lander.

"Check it, I got this."

"Huh, I'm coming in kinda shallow here..."

Just before crashing into the runway's slope.
NONONONONONONONONONO! PleaseStopPleasePleasePlease! NOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOO! ****!
